metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4443 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1.1, tvOS 12.1.1, watchOS 5.1.2,Safari 12.0.2, iTunes 12.9.2 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4443` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
